full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA 'PHRIN LAS 'CHOL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA STOBS LDAN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA 'PHRIN LAS 'CHOL BA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA STOBS LDAN YID 'GUL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG 'DI NYID BSTEN CING SGRUB PA'I ^BTZUN CHUNG AA MO GHA SI DHA BADZRA GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DHA NA S'A GA RA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG CHOS SKYONG CHENPO DGYES SHING 'PHRIN LAS @005A *, ,RNAM BZHIS GA-YEL MED SKYONG BAR MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BAR GYI YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG SBYIN PA TSUL KHRIMS SO, ,
